'''Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce is obtainable from [[Cipac]] for 1,250 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP and an additional '''800'''/'''1,000'''/'''1,200''' HP to the selected character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
